title: The Remarkables
description: Ranier Lu is one of six humans chosen to undertake a grand adventure - he will accompany a group of Pitcairns and juvenile Remarkables, intelligent treelike beings, on a ritual wilderness journey that marks the Remarkables' passage to adulthood. But one of Lu's companions has an agenda so cruel that Lu comes to fear for the safety of the entire Realm.
author: Robert Reed
